devdoc.author: Andrew Redden - <andrew@groundhog.network>

constructor.details: Allows to create new proxy contact and execute a message call to the new proxy within one transaction.

devdoc.title: Counter-factual PayingProxy Bootstrap contract A PayingProxy that can also be bootstrapped immediately following creation in one txn A random deployer account is created, this contract is nonce 0 from the transaction that creates the safe Using this Counter-factual address, a second address is generated, this is the safe address the user funds this address, and then this contract is deployed to bootstrap the safe and module creation
